name: Giant Shark Bowl
description: The Giant Shark Bowl is a massive ooze that can engulf multiple enemies, transforming into a dangerous and murky surface of lethal liquid. It has a peculiar appearance, resembling a mixture of gelatin and an aquatic predator.
memorable: It can control the battlefield by engulfing foes and dealing consistent damage, making it a formidable presence in combat.
goals: To dominate the battlefield by engulfing and restraining opponents.
relations: Often encountered in aquatic environments or alongside other aquatic creatures.
environment: Aquatic settings such as lakes or oceans.
strengths: Can engulf multiple smaller creatures, dealing continuous damage while restricting their movements.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to certain attack types since it has damage resistances to acid, fire, and slashing.
attacks: Makes powerful melee attacks with its Bite and Pseudopod, each dealing 22 piercing or bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Ooze Fish Bowl' ability, which allows it to engulf and restrain multiple creatures within its space.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 ft., allowing it to detect creatures within range even when blinded.
additional_information: Can absorb lightning damage and become charged, adding 2 extra damage to its attacks.
Has a symbiotic relationship with a giant shark, sharing statistics as a single unit.
Gains advantage on attacks against weakened foes due to Blood Frenzy.
test_queries: giant ooze with continuous damage ability
controller monster that can restrain bigger foes
